column1: Little Goat Diner////And then we sat.  And picked out drinks.  Then an app.  And our meals.  And DESSERT.  No server until 5:34pm.  Luckily
column3: and apologetic enough to be sincere but not annoying.  He wasn't our original server
column4: but he noticed an opportunity to deliver good service and did so.  His name was Carl
column6: our less-than-stellar start was turned around!
